instructions: Place the dinner plate on the table cloth so that it touches the bottom edge while remaining centere
Center the salad plate on the dinner plate.
Center the napkin on the salad plate.
Set the wine glass to the top right of the dinner plate so that it touches the table cloth edge.
Set the water glass to the lower right of the wine glass.
Place the salad fork on the left side of the dinner plate with the prongs pointing up.
Place the dinner fork to the right of the salad fork with the prongs pointed up.
Set the dinner knife to the right of the dinner plate with the blade facing the dinner plate.
Set the soup spoon the right of the dinner knife.
